experience: NEXT GENERATION TRADING APP BUX COMPLETES €10.6 MILLION FUNDING ROUND

Bringing the best people and professionals to the coolest startup, rocking the world of finance; Mainly working with tech roles but also responsible for the all non-tech openings (marketing, customer support, etc.)The first and only recruiter in the company; Full cycle of the hiring process (sourcing and recruitment) - quality vs quantity oriented approach;Involved in the employer branding activities (events, meetups, etc.)Check out our vacancies via getbux.com/vacancies  and feel free to contact me for any details

Data Driven Recruitment in a big scale. Relocating specialists all over the world.Headhunting for top talents in Software Development all over the world was involved in a full cycle of the recruitment process, using the best sourcing techniques to find, attract and hire Developers. No Linkedin, only hardcore :) Feel free to contact me for the details via yulia.bondar@booking.com

Key areas of responsibility:Dutch IT-Outsourcing company (700+ Employee) Recruitment Lead/HR Generalist•	Tight cooperation with Top management and European clients.•	Manage and facilitate recruiting team in delivering quality recruitment process•	Organize recruitment process, consult hiring managers regarding the process•	Consolidate recruitment statistics, fill in regular and ad-hoc reports•	Source, screen, interview, and evaluate candidates•	Manage Recruitment Marketing campaigns•	Explore the market best practices in the recruitment and staffing and implement appropriate best practices in the Company•	Build a quality relationship with the internal customers and external recruitment agencies•	Design and deliver training recruitment for HR Recruiters and line managers•	Organizing regular meetings of programmers the purpose of building community

1) Day-to-day recruiting Labor market analysis Full cycle of recruitment process: creating vacancie's description, job posting, resumes screening; conduction of interviews with appropriate candidates; arranging interviews with customers, making job-offers (searching for all positions opened in Levi9 Ukraine - most of them IT specialists) Communication with Delivery, Department and Account Managers to clarify and coordinate effective recruiting process Making weekly and monthly reports and analytics2) HR responsibilities Employee relations, HR Policies and Procedures, HR budgeting& reporting, conducting regular HR Reviews for Senior Management Motivation and retention programmes (“Introduction the company” meeting for joiners, Performance appraisals, progress reviews) Corporate culture development (internal events – tech talks, Happy Friday organization, corporate events) Responsible for language courses in the company3) PR connected activity External meet up organization Facebook company profile updating Participation in creating internal HR-Software Being a Product Owner in developing Internal Recruiting System Participating in Scrum (Making a prototype of system, creating user stories to fill PBI, Participating in grooming, planning and demo meetings)
1) Full cycle of recruitment process2) HR/PR responsibilities

March 14, 2014, Yuriy worked with Yulia in different groups

I have been working with Yulia for quite a while filling several open positions in my team, so I can speak with confidence about her professional qualities. What impresses me most about Julia is her attitude and commitment to the job - she's very passionate about it! Finding the right candidate for the position is not just work for her, it's more like a life perception, it brings balance and order into the world and makes her happy. Julia's education in psychology provides her with great power of understanding and "feeling" people. And, at the same time, she is IT-aware person and will never mistake Java for Java Script, which is, unfortunately, not a rare case with the IT Recruiters.Concluding the above, I recommend Yulia to anyone who wants to hire real IT Talents (not just anyone with an IT diploma), she will definitely get this job done for you.
